author: Amber Huerta
content:
How are more Americans not completely outraged about what is going on in our country!?

Does no one else find it weird that #BillGates - an unelected official  a computer guy with no medical degree  seems to be the world’s leading health expert on the coronavirus  telling everyone what we need to do & when its safe to go back to normal?

Its a little odd  that the same guy who led Event 201 just a few weeks before the first outbreak in China  where they had an exercise preparing & planning for a pandemic outbreak & can you guess what virus they chose for this "hypothetical" exercise? If you guessed the coronavirus you must be a psychic!

This is the same guy that's going to profit the most from this virus with his vaccines he's pushing on everyone. I can guarantee you right now they will make this a seasonal virus just like the flu  so they can profit off the vaccines every year.

In the past week  he's been making the media rounds on CNN & other shows saying we can all gather again once we've all been vaccinated! In another interview  he said that you will need to provide a vaccination certificate to work & travel.

He also has a company called ID 2020 which will track everyone through microchips the size of a grain of rice that they inject into you with a needle. It will track everywhere you go & everything you do  but please don't take my word for it  google ID 2020. This is not the future  they have already done it in some countries & even some workplaces.

Might I also add that this diabolical man is also THE largest donor of the World Health Organization? Think about that folks. THERE. IS. AN. AGENDA!!!

#ID2020 #pleasewaketfup #billgates #lockdown #economiccollapse #elitesagenda
#coronavirus #covid19 #event201 #agenda21

label: FALSE
title: the poem and the people stayed at home is over a century old and was inspired by the spanish flu pandemic
author: Marleen Pauwels
content:
De geschiedenis herhaalt zich.
Dit gedicht werd geschreven in 1869 en herdrukt in 1919 tijdens de epidemie van de Spaanse griep. History repeats itself. Apparently this poem was written in 1869  & reprinted during 1919 Pandemic. This is Timeless.... It was written in 1869 by Kathleen O’Meara: And people stayed at home
And read books
And listened
And they rested
And did exercises
And made art and played
And learned new ways of being
And stopped and listened
More deeply
Someone meditated  someone prayed
Someone met their shadow
And people began to think differently
And people healed.
And in the absence of people who
Lived in ignorant ways
Dangerous  meaningless and heartless 
The earth also began to heal
And when the danger ended and
People found themselves
They grieved for the dead
And made new choices
And dreamed of new visions
And created new ways of living
And completely healed the earth
Just as they were healed. Reprinted during Spanish flu
Pandemic  1919

justify: explanation the poem was published by the american poet kitty omeara in march 2020
label: FALSE
title: the poem and the people stayed at home is over a century old and was inspired by the spanish flu pandemic
author: Irene Vella
content:
It was March 11  2020  roads were empty  stores closed  people wouldn't come out anymore.
But spring knew nothing.
And the flowers kept blooming
And the sun is shining
And the swallows came back
And the sky was colored pink and blue
The morning was kneading bread and baking the donuts
It was getting dark later and later and in the morning the lights came in early through the windows closed
It was March 11th 2020 the kids were studying connected to discord
And in the afternoon the tressette meeting will be unfailing
It was the year you could go out just to get groceries
After a little while they closed everything
Even the offices
The army was starting to watch exits and boundaries
Because there was no more room for everyone in the hospitals
And people got sick
But spring didn't know and the gems kept coming out
It was March 11  2020 everyone was placed in mandatory quarantine
Grandparents families and young people
So the fear became real
And the days all looked the same
But spring didn't know and roses came back to bloom
The pleasure of eating together again
Of writing leaving imagination free
Of reading flying with fantasy
There were those who learned a new language
Who studied and who resumed the last exam that was missing from the thesis
Who understood to love really separated from
life life
Who stopped coming to terms with ignorance
Who closed the office and opened a tavern with only eight covered
Who left their girlfriend to scream love for their best friend to the world
There were those who became a doctor to help anyone who needed it tomorrow
It was the year you understood the importance of real health and affection
The year the world seemed to stop
And the economy is going down
But spring didn't know it and flowers gave way to fruit
And then came liberation day
We were on tv and the Prime Minister told unified networks that the emergency was over
And that the virus had lost
That the Italians all together had won
And then we went out on the street
With tears in my eyes
Without masks and gloves
Hugging our neighbor
Like he was our brother
And that's when summer came
Because spring didn't know
And he kept on being there
In spite of everything
Despite the virus
In spite of the fear
In spite of death
Because spring didn't know
And he taught everyone
The strength of life.
Irene Vella

justify: explanation catherine omeara  a retired teacher and chaplain  published the poem on her blog on 31620
label: False
title: a poem about people staying home was written by kathleen omara in 1869
author: Cindee Moyer
content:
i have had a few people fact check this poem and say it was actually written this year (2020) by Kitty O’Meara. So the poem and author are the same  just the year it was written was misrepresented. My apologies to her. In any event  the words expressed harken back to other pandemics and certainly fit today.

I shared it as follows  “History repeats itself. This poem was written in 1869  reprinted during the 1918 ‘Spanish Flu’ Pandemic. This is 'Timeless'.... written in 1869 by Kathleen O’Mara:

And people stayed at home
And read books
And listened
And they rested
And did exercises
And made art and played
And learned new ways of being
And stopped and listened more deeply
Someone meditated  someone prayed
Someone met their shadow
And people began to think differently
And people healed
And in the absence of people who
Lived in ignorant ways
Dangerous  meaningless and heartless 
The earth also began to heal
And when the danger ended and
People found themselves
They grieved for the dead
And made new choices
And dreamed of new visions
And created new ways of living
And completely healed the earth
Just as they were healed.

Reprinted during Spanish flu Pandemic  1919
Photo taken during Spanish flu

(Thank you Jodi Creager for sharing this.)

මේ දිනවල රටේ පවත්නා හදිසි තත්ත්වය හමුවේ විවිධ වෙබ් පිටු හා සමාජ මාධ්‍ය ඔස්සේ මාගේ ප්‍රකාශ ලෙස සකස් කළ පණිවිඩ හුවමාරු වන බව නිරීක්ෂණය විය. මෙම නිසා විවිධ සාවද්‍ය ප්‍රකාශ ජනගත වීමට ඉඩ ඇති හෙයින් සියලුම නිවේදන හෝ ප්‍රකාශ මාගේ නිල වෙබ් පිටු සහ සමාජ මාධ්‍ය පිටු හරහා පමණක් ප්‍රකාශයට පත්කරන බව දැනුම් දෙමි. நாட்டின் தற்போதைய அவசரகால நிலையில் - பொய்யான பல தகவல்கள்  என்னால் கூறப்பட்டவை என  பல்வேறுபட்ட இணையத் தளங்கள்  தொலைபேசித் தகவல்கள் மற்றும் சமூக ஊடகங்களின் மூலம் பரப்பப்படுகின்றன. இவை தவறான கருத்துக்களையே உருவாக்கக்கூடும் என்பதனால் - எனது அதிகாரபூர்வ அறிக்கைகள் மற்றும் அறிவிப்புகள் என்பன எனது அதிகாரப்பூர்வ இணையத்தளங்கள் மற்றும் சமூக ஊடக பக்கங்கள் மூலமாக மட்டுமே பகிரப்படும் என்பதனை உங்களுக்கு அறியத் தருகின்றேன்! During this crisis  there are messages purporting to be from me  being shared on social media and messaging platforms such as whatsapp  Viber  FB messenger etc.
Please note all messages and announcements from me are only published through official channels. #GotabayaRajapaksa #GRSM

Calling all little artists 👩‍🎨👨‍🎨 Last week when a new hospital in London asked for children’s pictures to decorate the walls so many pictures were created that there is no longer any space left. justify: explanation coronavirus is not an information weapon the virus caused a real pandemic
label: FALSE
title: coronavirus is an information weapon and its danger is exaggerated
author: Борис Максимчук
content:
I don't believe in this CORONAVIRUS is an INFORMATION WEAPON...
Not that he's gone  but not as scary as he's drawn.
Yes  the virus is  but it's no worse than the flu it was in 2009
What's going on? How do you know people can be programmed  under those or other events. Tell how everything should be. Initially  the coronavirus  which is not scary  but then pneumonia  which is also atypical and not treated. If you predict everything to a person  then everything will be so. Naví yuvaní  placebo... Information weapon... Plus fear will help these events happen. For example  in acupuncture  for any treatment  you need to remove the emotions of fear first. It is in fear that the root of any disease. And not only diseases  but any problems of life. The media has done their thing. Next  forced to walk in masks. Although it is commonly known that they should be worn only by the sick. On the roads put posts like those posts will help to keep the virus. A separate fear is fear of hunger and cold. Most are left without work and the opportunity to feed themselves and their family. And so on. I won't continue. A separate topic of sitting at home  that is  do not move and breathe fresh air. Even this will be enough to get lung inflammation. An example is in one of my previous posts. Many people haven't done anything from physical exercises before and didn't go out specifically outdoors. But at least moved to work and from work. It's actually catastrophic for athletes  as their body is more likely to function through muscle work. This will give an additional push to develop any diseases. Recall at least Dr. Komarovsky's lessons  who said that the cough does not increase in inflammation needs inhalation or even better fresh air. And all of us are quarantined. Coronavirus tests are exactly this mutated type. This is a separate conversation too. No matter how the Chinese invented it  no one would find this separate type of virus. You won't be found on anything in the next time?! Medicine and vaccine. They cannot be from a disease that does not exist. Another question  what is this panic being pushed for? Each country finds its moments. There is not little about this in my previous posts. An economic war. Everyone read about China  what exactly will it achieve internationally. China has achieved a lot inside the country. In China  it was actually planned ′′ ACTION ′′. Imagine  within a day to collect a hospital for several thousand men and not alone. Other countries saw the benefit and grabbed. Some have succumbed to panic  and some have officially no CORONAVIRUS. Italy first of all  will get rid of pensioners  although I really hope that this was not their goal. You do understand that it is pensioners who are most subjected to naví yuvaní. Ukraine has introduced a law on land. I'm for him  but I don't think it's done like this during a pandemic and at night.
But the main thing here is that there has been a world crisis on the nose for a long time. And this virus will simultaneously be her catalyst and justification for the political elites of all countries of the cause of this crisis to continue to remain in their positions... Many have told me that I panic  but I constantly tried to scatter it  tried to make you wonder where it could all take you. Part of those critically thinking agreed with me  the other part panicked me and accused me of all earthly sins. Thank you both camps for  it was you who all helped me create this picture I submitted to you now. Once again  your right to believe or criticize. But remember yourself in the short 2009 Analyze how you then felt about the chicken or swine flu epidemic and how you are about that situation. Didn't it get funny?! But there is also a positive virus. This is probably the Lord's plan. People need to start relying more on themselves  not on business medicine. Must believe in God and start praying. Nature should take a little rest from human actions  which allows man not to die from his own actions. I want to emphasize that I do not urge you not to observe quarantine or walk without masks. As they say the guardian and God will save. Those who believe in it are obligatory to wear it and it will really help you. I trust in God  nature wisdom  healthy lifestyle  sport  exercise  nutrition  psychosomatics  healthy sleep  positive mood... That's why I follow life. And that's exactly what will help me. I also wear a mask in crowded places  but in order for people not to fear me and of course to follow the general state rules. I think this post will have a lot of reposts  so I will write about myself: father of three children  doctor of pedagogical sciences (thesis is in the field of human health  not modern pharmaceutical business). I have several higher education - technical  legal  pedagogical  psychologist and coach. Master of sports  well-deserved coach of Ukraine  founder of the network of sports clubs and shops  repeated medalist of the World Cups in wrestling sambo and judo  public and political figure. Link to my wikipedia page in the first comment.

justify: explanation the posts use a fabricated letter with a state logo to claim all students much repeat a grade because of school closings state officials have publicly debunked the claim
label: False
title: missouri students will have to repeat the school year because of covid19 school closings
author: Governor Mike Parson
content:
Disinformation efforts vary from large sophisticated cyber campaigns  to amateurish fake fliers designed to look like they're from an official source  to word of mouth propaganda. Let's remain vigilant and on our guard. Here are some pages where you can get reliable  transparent information:
Missouri Department of Health and Senior Services
Missouri Department of Public Safety
Missouri State Emergency Management Agency
Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education
Missouri Department of Higher Education & Workforce Development
Missouri Department of Economic Development
Missouri Department of Labor and Industrial Relations
Missouri Veterans Commission
Missouri State Highway Patrol This fake letter is circulating on social media  saying DESE will not allow students to move on to the next grade level for the 2020-2021 school year because #COVID19 caused school closures and statewide required assessments to be cancelled.
➡️ That is simply not true. ⬅️
We could not be more disappointed that someone chose to use their free time to create this document  illegally using our department logo  and make a joke about something as serious as our students' education. This is particularly insensitive given the anxiety and uncertainty so many students and families are dealing with right now.

author: Міністерство охорони здоров'я України
content:
Clarification of the Minister of Health of Ukraine Ilya Yemts on the words about the vulnerability of pensioners to coronavirus Today  during a meeting of the Verkhovna Rada on Health of the Nation  many important issues were discussed  including the continuation of medical reform and the situation surrounding the spread of coronavirus in Ukraine. I want to explain separately the thesis about the special vulnerability to the infection of the older age. According to the world trend and medical research  they have or not the highest risk of infection and further lethal consequences. That is why the Ministry of Health of Ukraine pays special attention to this category of population  takes action  conducts an information campaign to reduce such risks. I also urge all citizens during this period to be especially conscious: elderly parents need attention and care the most right now. Provide them with everything you need to minimize the need to visit the mass cluster during quarantine.
